name: 愛依
text: おっ、冬優子ちゃんネイルしてる系～？
trans: Oh, Fuyuko-chan, you do your own nails?

name: 冬優子
text:
うん、プロデューサーさんが来るまで時間もあるし
ちょっとお手入れしておこうかなーって
trans: Yeah, since there's still time before Producer comes, Fuyu thought of doing some manicuring while waiting.

name: 愛依
text:
いーじゃん
ちょい、見てもい～い？
trans: Nice～! Hey, mind if I have a look?

name: 冬優子
text:
いいけど、普通だよ？
色も、ただのヌードカラーだし……
trans:
Sure, but it's nothing special.
Really, it's just a nude color.

name: 愛依
text:
どんなカンジどんなカンジ～？
おぉっ！
trans:
Lemme see, lemme see～?
Ooh!

name: 愛依
text:
ちょーキレイじゃん！
これ自前？　サロンばりにヤバいんですけど！
trans:
That's way pretty!
You did that? That's like salon-level!

name: 冬優子
text:
えへへ、ありがと～
手とか爪をお手入れするの、好きなんだ
trans:
Ehehe, thank you for the compliment.
Fuyu just happens to like taking care of her hands and nails.

name: 愛依
text:
わかる～、うちは友達と見せ合ったりすんの
好きなんだよね～
trans: I know right～! I love showing mine off to my friends～

name: 愛依
text:
あと～、うち最近デザイン変えたんだ～
ほら、見てみ！
trans:
Also, I had my design changed the other day!
Here, have a look!

name: 冬優子
text:
わぁ……！
カラフルで素敵だね♪
trans:
Wow...!
It's so colorful and wonderful♪

name: 愛依
text:
でしょ～？　ポイントはこのデカいリボン！
めっちゃ盛れたから、友達にも評判良くってさ！
trans:
I know right!? The main star is this big ribbon!
It looks so good that even my friends really dig it!

name: 愛依
text:
あ、そうだ！
冬優子ちゃんも、今度うちみたいにしてみる～？
trans:
Oh, I know!
Fuyuko, how about you do yours like mine next time?

name: 冬優子
text:
え？
愛依ちゃんみたいな……？
trans:
Eh?
Like Mei-chan's...?

name: 愛依
text:
そうそう！
あ、せっかくだし、メイクもうちと合わせようよ！
trans:
Yeah, yeah!
Ah, while we're at it, have your makeup match mine too!

name: 冬優子
text: メ、メイクも愛依ちゃんみたいに……？
trans: H-Have the makeup like yours too...?

name: 愛依
text:
冬優子ちゃんって清純派ー！　って感じじゃん？
ギャルっぽいメイクにしたらマジ迫力出そう！
trans:
You have this pure, innocent feel to you, right?
If you put some gyaru-like makeup, you're going to be so intense!

name: 冬優子
text: は、迫力……？
trans: I-Intense...?

name: 愛依
text:
いつか、髪とかも弄らせてよ！
ぜーったいみんなにもウケると思うし！
trans:
You gotta let me do your hair one time!
Everyone's totally gonna fall for you!

name: 冬優子
text:
う、うん！
そう、だね～……
trans:
Y-Yeah!
That's... true...

name: 愛依
text:
……って、ヤバ！　もうこんな時間じゃん！
うち用事あるから！　じゃね～
trans:
...oh, shoot! It's already this late!
There's something I've got to do! Later!

name: 冬優子
text: うん、お疲れ様～
trans: Okay, be careful~

name: 冬優子
text:
………あんな爪とかメイクなんて、
ウケが悪いに決まってんじゃん
trans: ...It's obvious that I won't get popular with those nails and makeup.

name: 冬優子
text:
大体、ふゆの手が綺麗なのは当たり前だっての！
どんだけ手入れに気を遣ってると思ってんの？
trans:
Besides, it's obvious that my hands are going to be
pretty! Just how much time do you think I spend
taking care of them?

name: 冬優子
text:
（可愛いなんて言いあっても
結局みんな、自分が一番って思ってるくせに……）
trans: (Complimenting others that they're cute, yet deep down, thinking your own is still the best...)

name: 冬優子
text:
（…………でも、さっきのへらへら笑った顔
そんな裏とかなさそうだったな……）
trans: (......But, her silly happy look on her face seems to say that there's no catch in what she's saying...)

name: 冬優子
text:
（……ていうか、あんま考えてなさそう
なんか、バカっぽいし……）
trans:
(...Or rather, it's like she's given no thought to it at
all. Kinda stupid, really...)

name: 冬優子
text:
たまには、ギャルみたいな
ネイルにしてみるのも、悪くないかもね……
trans: I guess it won't hurt if I do my nails a little gyaru-like from time to time...
